title: SCALE-Sim validation results against TPU v4 and v6e are now available here.
SCALE-Sim v3 is presented at ISPASS 2025 in Ghent, Belgium.
Our paper SCALE-Sim v3: SCALE-Sim v3: A modular cycle-accurate systolic accelerator simulator for end-to-end system analysis got accepted for ISPASS 2025.
We hosted SCALE-Sim tutorial at ISCA 2021.
Our paper A Systematic Methodology for Characterizing Scalability of DNN Accelerators using SCALE-Sim got accepted for ISPASS 2020.
